title: Neglected Roads Take Big Toll on Drivers' Bottom Line
text: BING NEWS: Urban Roads Take Toll on Drivers' Bottom Line, Study Shows Ravaged by potholes and neglect, the roads have gotten so bad, they're costing each drivers an average of $500 in car repairs each year.
